abstract: Wal-Mart will de-emphasize fashion apparel and concentrate on basic items like T-shirts and underwear because of the difficult economic climate.
snippet: Wal-Mart will de-emphasize fashion apparel and concentrate on basic items like T-shirts and underwear because of the difficult economic climate.
lead_paragraph: FAYETTEVILLE, Ark. — Wal-Mart said on Friday that it would buy back $15 billion more of its shares to try to improve returns for its shareholders.

headline.main: Wal-Mart to Buy Back Billions More in Shares
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart to Buy Back Billions More in Shares
